option.name: originalContent
option.value:
import os import pymysql
# Configurações do banco MySQL (hardcoded) DB_USER = 'root' DB_PASS = 'root' DB_HOST = '127.0.0.1' DB_PORT = 3306
# Caminho do arquivo SQL SQL_FILE = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), 'data', 'data.sql')
def run_sql(): # Conecta ao MySQL (sem banco específico) conn = pymysql.connect(host=DB_HOST, user=DB_USER, password=DB_PASS, port=DB_PORT, charset='utf8mb4') cur = conn.cursor()
with open(SQL_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: sql = f.read()
# Divide por ; e executa statements = [s.strip() for s in sql.split(';') if s.strip()] for stmt in statements: print(f"Executando: {stmt[:50]}...") cur.execute(stmt)
conn.commit() cur.close() conn.close() print("Banco criado e dados inseridos automaticamente!")
if __name__ == '__main__': run_sql()

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
import os import pymysql
# Configurações do banco MySQL (hardcoded) DB_USER = 'root' DB_PASS = '' # Senha vazia, ajuste se necessário DB_HOST = '127.0.0.1' DB_PORT = 3306
# Caminho do arquivo SQL SQL_FILE = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), 'data', 'data.sql')
def run_sql(): # Conecta ao MySQL (sem banco específico) conn = pymysql.connect(host=DB_HOST, user=DB_USER, password=DB_PASS, port=DB_PORT, charset='utf8mb4') cur = conn.cursor()
with open(SQL_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: sql = f.read()
# Divide por ; e executa statements = [s.strip() for s in sql.split(';') if s.strip()] for stmt in statements: print(f"Executando: {stmt[:50]}...") cur.execute(stmt)
conn.commit() cur.close() conn.close() print("Banco criado e dados inseridos automaticamente!")
if __name__ == '__main__': run_sql()

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
import os import psycopg2
# Configurações do banco PostgreSQL (hardcoded) DB_USER = 'postgres' DB_PASS = 'postgres' # Senha com acento, ajuste se necessário DB_HOST = '127.0.0.1' DB_PORT = 5432
# Caminho do arquivo SQL SQL_FILE = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), 'data.sql')
def run_sql(): # Conecta ao banco 'postgres' para criar o banco 'biblioteca' conn = psycopg2.connect(host=DB_HOST, user=DB_USER, password=DB_PASS, port=DB_PORT, database='postgres') conn.autocommit = True cur = conn.cursor()
try: cur.execute("CREATE DATABASE biblioteca;") print("Banco 'biblioteca' criado.") except psycopg2.errors.DuplicateDatabase: print("Banco 'biblioteca' já existe.") except Exception as e: print(f"Erro ao criar banco: {e}")
cur.close() conn.close()
# Agora conecta ao banco 'biblioteca' e executa o resto do SQL conn = psycopg2.connect(host=DB_HOST, user=DB_USER, password=DB_PASS, port=DB_PORT, database='biblioteca', options="-c client_encoding=utf8") cur = conn.cursor()
with open(SQL_FILE, 'r', encoding='cp1252') as f: sql = f.read()
# Divide por ; e executa (ignorando CREATE DATABASE) statements = [s.strip() for s in sql.split(';') if s.strip() and not s.upper().startswith('CREATE DATABASE')] for stmt in statements: print(f"Executando: {stmt[:50]}...") cur.execute(stmt)
conn.commit() cur.close() conn.close() print("Tabela criada e dados inseridos automaticamente!")
if __name__ == '__main__': run_sql()

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
import os import psycopg2
# Configurações do banco PostgreSQL (hardcoded) DB_USER = 'postgres' DB_PASS = 'postgres' # Senha com acento, ajuste se necessário DB_HOST = '127.0.0.1' DB_PORT = 5432
# Caminho do arquivo SQL SQL_FILE = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), 'data.sql')
def run_sql(): # Conecta ao banco 'postgres' para criar o banco 'biblioteca' conn = psycopg2.connect(host=DB_HOST, user=DB_USER, password=DB_PASS, port=DB_PORT, database='postgres') conn.autocommit = True cur = conn.cursor()
try: cur.execute("CREATE DATABASE biblioteca;") print("Banco 'biblioteca' criado.") except psycopg2.errors.DuplicateDatabase: print("Banco 'biblioteca' já existe.") except Exception as e: print(f"Erro ao criar banco: {e}")
cur.close() conn.close()
# Agora conecta ao banco 'biblioteca' e executa o resto do SQL conn = psycopg2.connect(host=DB_HOST, user=DB_USER, password=DB_PASS, port=DB_PORT, database='biblioteca', options="-c client_encoding=utf8") cur = conn.cursor()
with open(SQL_FILE, 'r', encoding='cp1252') as f: sql = f.read()
# Divide por ; e executa (ignorando CREATE DATABASE) statements = [s.strip() for s in sql.split(';') if s.strip() and not s.upper().startswith('CREATE DATABASE')] for stmt in statements: print(f"Executando: {stmt[:50]}...") cur.execute(stmt)
conn.commit() cur.close() conn.close() print("Tabela criada e dados inseridos automaticamente!")
if __name__ == '__main__': run_sql()

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
from sqlalchemy import create_engine, Column, Integer, String, TIMESTAMP, text from sqlalchemy.orm import declarative_base, sessionmaker
# Configurações do banco MySQL (hardcoded, similar a properties no Spring Boot) DB_USER = 'root' DB_PASS = 'root' DB_HOST = '127.0.0.1' DB_PORT = '3306' DB_NAME = 'biblioteca'
# URL de conexão MySQL DATABASE_URL = f"mysql+pymysql://{DB_USER}:{DB_PASS}@{DB_HOST}:{DB_PORT}/{DB_NAME}?charset=utf8mb4"
# Engine e Session engine = create_engine(DATABASE_URL, echo=False) SessionLocal = sessionmaker(bind=engine, autoflush=False, autocommit=False) Base = declarative_base()
# Modelo da tabela users class User(Base): __tablename__ = 'users' id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True) username = Column(String(150), unique=True, nullable=False) password = Column(String(255), nullable=False) created_at = Column(TIMESTAMP, server_default=text('CURRENT_TIMESTAMP'))
# Função para criar tabelas def init_db(): Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)
# Teste de conexão if __name__ == '__main__': try: with engine.connect() as conn: print("Conexão com MySQL OK!") except Exception as e: print(f"Erro na conexão: {e}")

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
from sqlalchemy import create_engine, Column, Integer, String, TIMESTAMP, text from sqlalchemy.orm import declarative_base, sessionmaker
# Configurações do banco MySQL (hardcoded, similar a properties no Spring Boot) DB_USER = 'root' DB_PASS = '' # Senha vazia, ajuste se necessário DB_HOST = '127.0.0.1' DB_PORT = '3306' DB_NAME = 'biblioteca'
# URL de conexão MySQL DATABASE_URL = f"mysql+pymysql://{DB_USER}:{DB_PASS}@{DB_HOST}:{DB_PORT}/{DB_NAME}?charset=utf8mb4"
# Engine e Session engine = create_engine(DATABASE_URL, echo=False) SessionLocal = sessionmaker(bind=engine, autoflush=False, autocommit=False) Base = declarative_base()
# Modelo da tabela users class User(Base): __tablename__ = 'users' id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True) username = Column(String(150), unique=True, nullable=False) password = Column(String(255), nullable=False) created_at = Column(TIMESTAMP, server_default=text('CURRENT_TIMESTAMP'))
# Função para criar tabelas def init_db(): Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)
# Teste de conexão if __name__ == '__main__': try: with engine.connect() as conn: print("Conexão com MySQL OK!") except Exception as e: print(f"Erro na conexão: {e}")
